snippet: New York City Opera's music library was "totally ruined" by flooding from Hurricane Sandy, but the company's archival material can be salvaged, a spokeswoman said.
abstract: New York City Opera's music library was "totally ruined" by flooding from Hurricane Sandy, but the company's archival material can be salvaged, a spokeswoman said.

headline.main: City Opera Aims to Salvage Archive Damaged by Storm
headline.print_headline: City Opera in a Push To Save Archives
